word_mean: 单狂，偏狂：一种精神疾患，其特征是对一种事物或思想有偏见

sentence.Network_en: "It is the sort of malady which we call monomania," said the doctor.
sentence.Network_cn: “这种病我们叫做偏执狂。”医生说道。

sentence.Network_en: The western world was indeed black with homicidal monomania.
sentence.Network_cn: 西方世界的确被杀人狂抹黑了.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 有谁知道Otaku是什么意思？_爱问知识人 ... Love 爱 Monomania 偏执狂 Newtype 新人类.
monologuist 独白者monomania 热狂monomaniacal 偏执狂者
monologue 独白monomania 偏狂monomphalus 脐部联胎
GRE词汇精选（核心词汇） ... monologue 独白；个人长篇演说 monomania 偏狂症，狂热病 monopoly 专利权，垄断.

encyclopedia.content: Monomania、Paranoid，都是指偏执狂，前者重点在心理，而后者重点在行为。偏执狂是否一种病态？是否一种心理障碍？但是，世界上许多成功者，例如希特勒、东条英机、墨索里尼等，都是偏执狂患者。

means.word_mean: 1. a mania restricted to one thing or idea

auth_sentence.content: Dedication is thought to be synonymous with monomania.
auth_sentence.res_content: Dedication is thought to be synonymous with monomania.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Dedication is thought to be synonymous with monomania.

auth_sentence.content: But the point was not the wrong fact, it was the monomania that gave rise to it.
auth_sentence.res_content: But the point was not the wrong fact, it was the monomania that gave rise to it.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But the point was not the wrong fact, it was the monomania that gave rise to it.

stems_affixes.word_buile: mono单个,一个+atom原子+ic的→adj.[化]单原子的
mono单个,一个+ton声音+ous……的→一个声音→单调的
mon=mono单个,一个+arch统治者→一个统治者
mono单个,一个+gamy婚姻→n.一夫一妻制
mono单个,一个+graph写→写一个主题→专题论文
mono单个,一个+lith石头→n.独块巨石
mono单个,一个+logu说话+e→一个人说话→独白
mono单个,一个+mania狂→对一事的热狂→偏执狂
mono单个,一个+poly卖→独家卖→垄断
